website_summaries.verdict: Outstanding, contemporary china that isn't so trendy it will fall out of fashion. Heirloom-quality stuff.
pros: Real bone china that will impress your guests
cons: It is china and that means it costs a fair amount per place setting
Still, the price isn't reasonable for what you are getting

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set
customer_reviews.text: I bought my set 3 years ago and still looking great. I just love using the teacups for my jasmine tea, such a delight!
customer_reviews.author: Cielo

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Dishes are beautiful!! But I recieved items at first time dishes are broken and I wanted to replace items. So I recieved another one. Dishes are broken again. I am so frustrated
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and arrived broken both times.
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice, however shipping seems to be a nightmare. I have ordered the set twice now and on both occasions it has arrived with at least one broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Won't order this set again
customer_reviews.text: The china came in a Royal Albert box which indicated it was made in Bangladesh..it was well packaged and in perfect condition..matched my other old country roses pieces EXCEPT the gold trim on the edge of the plates does not wrap around the edge of the plate..when viewed from the side in a stack of plates these definitely stand out as being different..when viewed from the top there is no difference..all my other pieces are made in Indonesia or England..I will keep them but I won't order this boxed set again..
customer_reviews.author: MarLeeB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set but One Broken Plate
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was fine, the box wasn't dented in any shape or form (packaged with bubble wrap before putting it in a shipping box) however, when opening the box, one of the plates inside was shattered. I was going to replace it, but because the scheduled tea party is approaching soon, we won't be able to get it replaced on time. Instead, we'd probably have to buy the one piece elsewhere. I would still recommend it to others since it's an amazing work of art, but hopefully this isn't a habit to the company for sending broken sets.
customer_reviews.author: CujoEX

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful china
customer_reviews.text: I had bought my wife an exact set (service for 4) and always wanted to get another set, so we would have service for eight. This set was a really good price, and they shipped really fast. The seller did a great job packing the dishes, and not one was chipped. My original set is made in England, and this one was made in China ( i understood this before i bought them) and there is not one difference in the two side by side.Needless to say, my wife was thrilled to open these on her birthday, and in turn, i am thrilled as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great dinnerware set!
customer_reviews.text: These dinnerware set is fantastic. Well made china set, haven't had to worry about the decorative embellishments fading or peeling away. The roses are just fantastic looking. Thanks so much for these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great China Pattern!
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this China pattern. With all the pieces in the set, it will provide a great item for Christmas and Birthdays for a long time. The workmanship is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Majestic
customer_reviews.text: We always had Royal Albert OCR at home so I knew what to expect. Well we're absolutely thrilled with them; they're really beautiful, fine translucent china with the inimitable delicate flower design. They even sound lovely when used. Made in Bangladesh, they were a fraction of the original cost, so you don't have to weep if you drop one. They make the table and the whole room elegant and welcoming. I wouldn't worry about what's printed on the bottom. Beneath the little bunch of flowers it just says: Old Country Roses. Royal Albert. Registered mark. Bone China. Copyright mark, 1962 Royal Albert LTD. Thoroughly recommended for those who like to dine in style every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cookie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Everything I have come to expect from Royal Albert. Excellent

product_meta.title: Royal Albert Old Country Roses 20-Piece Dinnerware Set, Service for 4 - IOLCOR00840
product_meta.description:
The best-selling dinnerware pattern in the world, the Old Country Roses pattern is practically synonymous with the name Royal Albert and a long-standing testament to timeless style and elegant craftsmanship. This 20-Piece Place Setting includes everything needed for four guest's full dinner service; each setting consisting of a beautiful fine china dinner plate, salad plate, bread & butter plate, teacup and saucer; decorated with the Old Country Roses signature motif of burgundy, pink and yellow roses, accented with lustrous gold banding.

AMAZON.COM
Designed in 1962 by Harold Holdcroft, Royal Albert's Old Country Roses has become one of the most popular china patterns in the company's century-long history. The sumptuous design is enhanced by the elegant Montrose shape, graceful floral ornamentation, rich feminine colors, and a grace and elegance that is uniquely English. This dinnerware set is the perfect way to start off a collection that will last a lifetime and never go out of style. 

 This 20-piece service for four includes four dinner plates, four salad plates, four bread and butter plates, and four teacups and saucers. Each dish is crafted from the finest bone china and has been richly adorned by hand with 22-carat gold. For best results, Royal Albert recommends washing by hand. --Lea Werbel 

 What's in the Box
4 place settings. Each place setting consists of: 10-1/2-inch dinner plate; 8-inch salad plate; 6-1/4-inch bread and butter plate; 5-1/2-inch saucer; 6-1/2 ounce-teacup. 20 pieces total.
feature_bullets: Old Country Roses Collection by Royal Albert.
This 20-Piece Place Setting includes everything needed for four guest's full dinner service; each setting consisting of three beautiful fine china plates and a cup with saucer.
Inspired by the quintessentially English country garden with roses in full bloom.
Old Country Roses is Royal Albert's most successful pattern and collector's love to add to their collection.
Pristine white bone china with vivid glazes and 22-carat gold trim.
Washing by hand is recommended and is not microwave safe.
This is a perfect gift to give!
Included components: 4 Dinner Plates, 4 Salad Pl, 4 Butter Pl, 4 Cups and Saucers
Measures Dinner plate: 10.5", Salad Plate 8", Bread & Butter Plate: 6.3", Teacup: 4.3", Saucer: 5.5".
